analyzed: yang dang yang du dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'byin pas /

analyzed: de'i slad du bdag la dge slong rnams kyis spo ba dang / gzhi nas spo ba dang / mgu par bgyi ba stsol pa dang / 'byin pas bgyi ba mang zhing bgyid pa mang pas /
translated: I have been given probation, I have been given the trial period, I have been given reconciliation, and I have been given rehabilitation.

original: lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bgyid pa dang / nang du sems zhi gnas su bgyi ba shor nas /🔽dge 'dun gyis bdag la smad pa'i 'phrin las mdzad lags te /
analyzed: lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bgyid pa dang / nang du sems zhi gnas su bgyi ba shor nas / dge 'dun gyis bdag la smad pa'i 'phrin las mdzad lags te /
translated: I have lost my recitation, reading, chanting, yoga, mental attention, and inner mental stability and peace.🔽The saṅgha has performed the action of censuring me.

original: smad pa'i 'phrin las mdzad lags pas /
analyzed: smad pa'i 'phrin las mdzad lags pas /

analyzed: bdag skra gyen du 'greng ba lta bu dang / skra zhig pa lta bu dang / dge 'dun la spu sa la ltung ba lta bur bgyid /

original: 'byung bar bskyod /
analyzed: 'byung bar bskyod /

original: mtshungs par nye bar ston /
analyzed: mtshungs par nye bar ston /

analyzed: mtshams kyi nang du mchis @216b nas bslang ba gsol te /

analyzed: yang dang yang du ltung ba 'byin pa yang spong bar bgyid na /

original: dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /

analyzed: bdag dge slong legs ldan yang dang yang du ltung ba 'byin pa /

analyzed: smad pa'i 'phrin las mdzad lags pa bslang bar gsol /

analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /

analyzed: dge slong legs ldan yang dang yang du ltung ba 'byin te zhes bya ba nas / nang du sems zhig gnas su bgyi ba'i zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste / dge 'dun gyis 'di yang dang yang du ltung ba bgyid pas /

analyzed: 'byung bar bskyod /

analyzed: zas slong bar byed /

original: mig zur gyis lta bar byed /
analyzed: mig zur gyis lta bar byed /

original: 'phyar bar byed /
analyzed: 'phyar bar byed /

original: lus kyis snyog par byed /
analyzed: lus kyis snyog par byed /

analyzed: stan gcig la yang lhan cig 'dug par byed /

analyzed: phor bu gcig tu chang rnam pa sna tshogs 'thung bar byed /

original: 'bud du 'jug /
analyzed: 'bud du 'jug /

original: gos rnams brjes nas rgyug par byed /🔽mchong bar byed /
analyzed: gos rnams brjes nas rgyug par byed / mchong bar byed /

original: lag 'gros kyis kyang bskor bar byed /
analyzed: lag 'gros kyis kyang bskor bar byed /

original: nya tshar gyis kyang bskor bar byed /
analyzed: nya tshar gyis kyang bskor bar byed /

analyzed: chu bgags shing gtong bar byed / chu la sbal ba'i skad 'byin /

analyzed: chu la rnga'i sgra yang 'byin / glang po che'i skad kyang 'byin /

analyzed: khas rdza rnga'i skad kyang 'byin /

analyzed: khas dung dang / khas rnga dang / rma bya'i skad kyang 'byin / khu byug gi @218a *//

original: skad kyang 'byin /
analyzed: skad kyang 'byin /

original: glang po che'i 'thab mo yang byed /
analyzed: glang po che'i 'thab mo yang byed /

original: rta'i 'thab mo dang / khyu mchog gi 'thab mo dang / ma he'i 'thab mo dang / ra'i 'thab mo dang / lug gi 'thab mo dang / bud med kyi 'thab mo dang / skyes pa'i 'thab mo dang / gzhon nu'i 'thab mo dang / gzhon nu ma'i 'thab mo dang /
analyzed: rta'i 'thab mo dang / khyu mchog gi 'thab mo dang / ma he'i 'thab mo dang / ra'i 'thab mo dang / lug gi 'thab mo dang / bud med kyi 'thab mo dang / skyes pa'i 'thab mo dang / gzhon nu'i 'thab mo dang / gzhon nu ma'i 'thab mo dang /

analyzed: bya gag gi 'thab mo dang / sreg pa'i 'thab mo dang / byi khra'i 'thab mo yang byed cing byed du 'jug ste /
translated: They also engage in and encourage cockfights, quail fights, and rat fights.

original: de rnams dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: de rnams dang / gzhan yang /
translated: They do these and other things.

original: dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa byed cing byed du 'jug go /
analyzed: dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa byed cing byed du 'jug go /
translated: They do and encourage things that are not the work of ascetics.

analyzed: de gnyis kyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa des /
translated: Because of their conduct, behavior, and wrong practice,

analyzed: ri nag po la dge slong ma 'ongs pa rnams mi 'ongs shing /
translated: no other monks will come to Black Mountain,

analyzed: 'ongs pa rnams mi 'dod pas ri nag po'i gnas 'dor bar byed do //

analyzed: ri nag po na gnas pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang yid ma rangs shing ma mgu bas 'ongs nas /

translated: They will not even consider giving alms to the long-term residents, let alone to the newcomers.

original: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
analyzed: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
translated: After some time,

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang / ri nag por phyin nas ri nag por 'dug go /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thabs bgos /
translated: In the morning, the venerable Ānanda put on his under robe,

analyzed: chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas /

original: ri nag por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa las /
analyzed: ri nag por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa las /

translated: Just as he was washing his bowl, he returned,🔽and he did not receive any alms,

original: chung du na bsod snyoms gcig kyang ma rnyed do //
analyzed: chung du na bsod snyoms gcig kyang ma rnyed do //

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: The venerable Ānanda thought,

original: ri nag po 'di sngon yang 'byor zhing rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar gyur cing /
analyzed: ri nag po 'di sngon yang 'byor zhing rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar gyur cing /
translated: “In the past, this Black Mountain was prosperous, flourishing, well-populated, and full of people,

original: bsod snyoms pa dang / slong ba pas rnyed sla bar gyur la /
analyzed: bsod snyoms pa dang / slong ba pas rnyed sla bar gyur la /
translated: It is easy for the alms-begging monk to get alms.

original: da dung yang ri nag po 'di 'byor cing rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar gyur na /
analyzed: da dung yang ri nag po 'di 'byor cing rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar gyur na /
translated: If this Black Mountain were to become prosperous, flourishing, happy, well-watered, and full of people,

original: 'on kyang bdag ni /🔽ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas ri nag por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa lhung bzed bkrus pa de bzhin du slar log ste sbyin pa yang ma rnyed /
analyzed: 'on kyang bdag ni / ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas ri nag por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa lhung bzed bkrus pa de bzhin du slar log ste sbyin pa yang ma rnyed /
translated: then I would🔽return empty-handed, just as I went out empty-handed.

original: tshig kyang ma ster te /
